social_work: Served on the CORE COMMITTEE for Techideate (Tech Fest of MUJ) 2023. Led the Hospitality committee.
Contributed to the smooth running of CIRCON (Conclave Event of MUJ 2024 as part of the VOLUNTEERING COMMITTEE in Hospitality Team.
Held a leadership position on the EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE for TMC Live (Music Fest of MUJ) 2023. This experience involved planning, organizing, and executing a large-scale music festival.

projects.name: HOTEL MANAGEMENT SYSTEM
projects.description: Developed a HOTEL MANAGEMENT SYSTEM using Python for data manipulation and MySQL for database management. This project automated tasks like guest check-in/out, room booking, and bill generation, improving efficiency and data organization.

projects.name: FACE MASK DETECTION SYSTEM
projects.description: Using OpenCV and Python, a real-time FACE MASK DETECTION SYSTEM was constructed. In order to identify people wearing masks in a video stream, this experiment used computer vision, which may have implications for public health and safety regulations.
